page.title: 13Malmesbury - Milbourne
page.content: { {Milbourne}is a dormitory area 1.5 Km from{Malmesbury}. There are no shops, churches or pubs.Children mostly go to school in{Malmesbury}and{Lea .}There are some old farm houses and cottages built of Cotswold stone,they were built before the war.Near the water tower are some semi-detached brick houses built after the war. South of the these is a large estate of bungalows built in the 1960's.There used to be{Vineyards}at Milbourne and great stone slabs upon which the monks of the{Abbey}walked to get to the Vineyards.When Monks Park an estate of 25 houses and bungalows was built the stone slabs were dug up and thrown over the wall of some adjoining property.If you scrape away the surface along the hedgerow you can find stone slabs.
